topic.title: Does ZeroMe contain all users data in the site?
topic.body: As my self only use ZeroMe on my peer server (600 GB storage) so I don't really concern about the size of it, but on mobile is totally different story. I only have around 2 GB of storage as max for the site. Does ZeroMe really fit my phone, or the site downloads data on demand?

1605268368_1LKV9xTJGWsmvJNHYC5Y7KPSiUY48.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_2685_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): No. It's a merger site, so it's only an interface for data. Data is stored in hubs. [...]

Very clear explanation. Thank you!

> [jizzontits](#comment_2_1KNkHfHESMzY6Lg7wCVkMzY5a4RenNw9kC): meh, i'll just create a new id. joke's on you though, you got triggered.

0chan porn is your place, m8

1606646882_1Mr7C9iP1DeHKW8rRCGxVgSd5WS9y.body: It seems like youbare trying to do something with Millchan, like commenting on a restricted area or any sort.

1606619291_1JMrG6HuqZast8Kn4n4SCjosDVAAY.body: You may use ZeroList or ZeroSites instead, or will be end up with argument and hates.

1606531643_1G6LndVZrdXsunwT6CGRScNkK3Gi2.body: a bit raw, eat it with Thai noodles

1606503160_1H9ZCecP2nbVicgXB77yqodz2xp4C.body: Foods on earth are just too delicious and irresistible.

1568753767_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body:
My first impression is "freedom"

But for now, it is just because there are so many crazy people around here I can talk to, LOL.

1606253317_1H9ZCecP2nbVicgXB77yqodz2xp4C.body: I only care about my privacy (a bit of censorship regards of state policy is fine), DuckDuckGo fits my category perfectly.

1607868478_1MUqNCPTZnz9R3c39yWSQesf3gwbC.body:
I love how people are smart enough to know the ZeroNet's existence, but also dumb enough to think that COVID is a hoax.

Back to the topic. Yes, COVID is REAL, but it is also NOT SCARY if you are strictly in the government rules and take recommendations. Wearing mask, social distancing, sanitizing, and being healthy. All of these, you'll still have a normal life. Don't be a dunce just be cause the word 'freedom' or 'liberty' if you don't know how the world works (if you know, please tell me), and you still wanna be alive.

Someone also have said that COVID is just another flu, and yes it is. But COVID is more dangerous because the infected can widely spread the virus without any symtoms for around 14 days, and vaccines are not widely available yet, even worse now UK had a new type of virus that is more effective the the original one. These are the reason why COVID have killed millons.
